metadata.description: Orases curated Claude Code plugins for Jira workflow management, session analysis, and business process visualization

plugins.name: jira-tools
plugins.description: Jira productivity tools and integrations for Claude Code. Includes Jira ticket management, workflow automation, and platform integrations.

plugins.name: workflow-analyzer
plugins.description: Advanced workflow analysis and optimization tools for Claude Code. Analyzes development patterns, tracks session transcripts, and provides intelligent recommendations.

plugins.name: ba-toolkit
plugins.description: A Claude Code skill that transforms written workflow steps into interactive, browser-based visual process flow diagrams with clickable elements.
